page.title: 19RELIGION - PATCHWAY EAST
page.content: There are 4 Christian communities in Patchway,but only 3 churches. { Anglicans and Methodists}share St. Chads. The parish numbers around 13,000. Services are shared twice on Sunday.There is a weekly sunday school and monthly a separate communion service. There is one vicar and a deaconess,who can only conduct services.There is also a C.of E.School { Holy Family Catholic Church}was built in 1966. The parish numbers 2,000 and covers a wide area- Patchway part of Filton and over to the Severn Bridge. Mass is on Sat.evening and twice on Sunday. There is a priest and 2 special ministers who help. Holy Family is our primary school. { Patchway Baptist Church}was built in 1974.There is a vicar and one woman preacher. Weekly congregation number about 50-60(am) and 30-40(pm).
